issue.title: [CI] docker-clang-format nightly failing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6914](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6914). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Don't know what happened but this needs to either be fixed or removed from the nightlies

```Java

Successfully built 86ece22bd823
Successfully tagged arrowdev/arrow-lint:latest
WARNING: The CI_ARROW_SHA variable is not set. Defaulting to a blank string.
WARNING: The CI_ARROW_BRANCH variable is not set. Defaulting to a blank string.
ERROR: No such service: clang-format
Exited with code 1
```

https://circleci.com/gh/ursa-labs/crossbow/3923?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6914?focusedCommentId=16964479) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We can remove this because `clang-format` is merged into `lint`.

ARROW-7034 removed this.
